Jargon Term: Please make sure to discuss with your doctor when it is appropriate for you to restart your metoprolol and lovenox
Annotation: Aftercare instructions - patient needs to do - Medication

Jargon Term: If you experience any shortness of breath, chest pains, abdominal pains, fevers or chills, or any other concerning symptoms please call your doctor or return to the emergency room
Annotation: Aftercare instructions - patient needs to do - Other
